name: House of Vincent
subtitle: Website + Webshop
body: House of Vincent's webshop is implemented with Shopify and has several customised features. The customisations of the Shopify theme are made with Liquid, JavaScript, HTML and CSS.

name: BOUMATIC A/S & BOUTIME APP
subtitle: WEBSITE + WEB APP + MOBILE APP
body: BouMatic A/S is an international company that delivers dairy solutions. I have designed and implemented their WordPress Website and an intranet app for web and mobile called BouTime. The BouTime App is developed with JavaScript and the Ionic Framework.

name: CAFÉ SIDEWALK
subtitle: Website
body: Probably the Coziest Café with the best location in Aarhus. The website is implemented with WordPress and customisations in a child theme.

name: theBIGfridge
subtitle: Mobile App
body: theBIGfridge is a mobile app for iOS, developed with the Ionic Framework. The main focus of the theBIGfridge is to minimise the waste of food. The app is available for iPhone.

name: CPH Cloud Company
subtitle: Web & App Development
body: As Freelance Web App developer for CPH Cloud Company ApS, I have worked with several clients like Dansk Retursystem, Troelstrup, Novo Nordisk and Kongernes Samling.

name: Karolines Hus
subtitle: Website
body: Karolines Hus is a gallery located on Fur in Denmark. The website is implemented with WordPress.
